'''Paul Dhinakaran''' is an [[India]]n christian evangelist and the Chancellor of [[Karunya University]]. He is the son of the evangelist [[D.G.S. Dhinakaran]] and runs the evangelist ministry ''Jesus Calls''.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Kanchi-Shankaracharya-meets-Christian-evangelist/articleshow/36542908.cms|title=Kanchi Shankaracharya meets Christian evangelist|date=05 February 2003|work=[[Times of India]]|accessdate=10 February 2010}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.thehindu.com/2009/07/09/stories/2009070952880300.htm|title=âIndia occupying globally competitive position in space technologyâ |date=09 July 2009|work=[[The Hindu]]|accessdate=10 February 2010}}</ref>
â
Education:
  â   â
Born on 4th September 1962, he entered his youthhood away from God, deeply depressed and fully gripped with a fear regarding his future. But the Lord spoke to him through his father Dr. D.G.S. Dhinakaran, a Prophet that touched his life deeply. His life never remained the same again. He began to prosper in wisdom and knowledge. After completing his MBA, he was the first student in the University of Madras to earn a PhD in management science at the young age of 27.
  â   â
Runs a University:
  â   â
Today, he spearheads the Karunya University that was founded in 1986 with a divine vision to âraise leaders in technology with high spiritual values and commitment to societyâ. Accredited with âAâ grade in the country, this University is located in Coimbatore in a sprawling area of 600 acre lush green campus. Under his able leadership as Founder and Chancellor, Karunya University has carved a niche for itself in the field of higher education today. At present, 5400 students from all parts of India and abroad pursue their higher education from their undergraduate to doctoral levels in the fields of engineering, technology and management.
  â   â
Member in Govt. of India Committees
  â   â
A man who frequently rubs shoulders with eminent leaders of the nation, Dr. Paul was appointed by the present Prime Minister of India as a Member of the National Monitoring Committee for Minority Education and as a Member of the Governing Council of âEducation for allâ Committee, both in the Education department of the Government of India. He had also served as a Syndicate Member of the Bharathiar University for two consecutive terms appointed by the Governor of the State of Tamilnadu.
  â   â
Prayer Towers
  â   â
Dr. Paul Dhinakaran dedicated his entire life for the ministry of God. As a visionary, he revolutionized the âJesus Callsâ ministry in several ways. He was instrumental in establishing Jesus Calls âPrayer Towersâ throughout the globe in 7 countries and all over India where Prayer Intercessors offer dedicated prayers all the 24 hours for thousands of people daily.
  â   â
Television Ministry worldwide
  â   â
He is also the chief architect of the worldwide television ministry of Jesus Calls that produces nearly 135 TV programmes per week, carrying Christâs love and compassion in a world-class manner to nearly two-thirds of the globe in many regional and national languages. Recently, he launched the âRainbow TVâ, a 24 hours TV channel as per the leading of the Lord to bring the healing touch of God to millions of homes across European nations and abroad.Standing in front of half a million people on a rainy evening, with a divine burden to bring blessings to the brokenhearted, ready to preach the good news with power and authority, and pleading with the Lord to stop the lashing rains and very soon to the amazement of everyone gathered there, the heavy downpour comes to a standstill, people fold their umbrellas and begin to listen to the Word of God delivered through him with rapturous attention and a renewed hope â an apt description of Dr. PAUL DHINAKARAN, a mighty apostle of God from the land of India. This is only a small miracle in the global ministry of Dr. Paul Dhinakaran that is filled with numerous signs and wonders and the abounding grace of God, attended by even 300,000 people in an evening meeting addressed by him. He is endowed by God with the gifts of prophecy, Word of knowledge, healings and faith as he brings Godâs word prophetically to people, the nations and churches and the Lord does miracles when he prays for people and nations.
  â   â
Ambassadors Network
  â   â
The Lord gave a special vision to Dr. Paul Dhinakaran to connect every pin code (zip code) of India through a network of dedicated, spirit filled volunteers of God through the Ambassador Network. These Ambassadors go around and pray for the people with the love and compassion of God. Similarly, the Jesus Calls âFamily Blessing Planâ given by the Lord to Dr. Paul proves to be an enormous blessing to several thousands of families who have began to experience the blessings of love, peace and prosperity in their homes.
  â   â
Care for the poor and needy
  â   â
Moved by the Love of God for the poor, Dr. Paul Dhinakaran started âSeeshaâ, the social arm of Jesus Calls Ministry which feeds and helps thousands of poor and downtrodden from the impoverished sections of the society. Several hundreds of rurally backward children receive free tutorial education and free medical camps and environmental awareness campaigns are also regularly conducted by Seesha for the benefit of these people.
  â   â
Singer
  â   â
Traveling far and wide carrying the love and compassion of God, Dr. Paul has also authored many best selling books that have captured the heart of the youth. His songs through audio and video albums permeate the divine peace of God. The Canada Christian College in Toronto has conferred him an honorary doctorate in divinity.
  â   â
Family
  â   â
Dr. Paul Dhinakaran is married to Sis. Evangeline Paul Dhinakaran who stands as a tremendous support in his untiring ministry to the brokenhearted. They have three sweet children, who have already begun to serve the Lord besides their studies, son Samuel and daughters Sharon and Stella Ramola.
  â
For Prayers, mail to : paul@jesuscalls.org
